alert.note: Alert for Centre; Clinton; Lycoming; Montour; Northumberland; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 4:21PM EDT until July 14 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Centre County in central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Clinton County in north central Pennsylvania... South central Lycoming County in north central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Montour County in central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Northumberland County in central Pennsylvania... Union County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 419 PM EDT, a line of severe thunderstorms was located from near Mackeyville to Laurelton Center, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Williamsport, Milton, Lewisburg, Montoursville, Jersey Shore, Mifflinburg, Carroll, Watsontown, Montgomery, Linntown, Avis and Duboistown. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Lamar and Buckhorn exits, specifically from mile markers 175 to 225. This includes Interstate 180 between mile markers 1 and 10, and from mile markers 19 to 29. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Centre; Clinton; Lycoming; Montour; Northumberland; Union
